name: Plant-2019| World Congress on Plant Science and Molecular Biology| Massive Sci Group Conferences
content: Dear Colleague, I'm honored to invite you as a speaker in World Congress on Plant Science and Molecular Biology Valencia Spain, an organized Conference happening on September 17-19, 2019 in Valencia, Spain. Plant -2019 Organizing Committee anticipates 500 speakers from 50 Countries. We would like to inform you that 6 International Plant Science and Molecular Biology association Presidents are attending as key note speakers. For more information on the conference please view the website at http://massivegroup.org/plant-science-conference/ Best Regards, Jim Anderson plant@massivegroup.info plant@massivegroup.org
